name: As Fast As Possible
description:
As Fast As Possible


As Fast As Possible is a 3d platformer in which you jump through time and space as an astronaut. The goal in each Level is to master it as fast as possible. During the level a timer runs in which you must have passed the level. For each level there is a leaderboard with the fastest times. Difficult jumps, ice slides and wallrunns awaid you.

Multiplayer

Together with your friends or strangers you can compete against each other and show who is the better jump 'n runer. An online map contains 3 levels in which you have to master jump 'n run courses. After each course there are points depending on the placement. The winner is the one with the most points in the end. In the game mode "Hit" you can push other players during the courses.
